name: High Fog - Route one
description:
Clearwater Cove is at least a little bit foggy most days... but every year, on one exact night, the fog becomes so thick that it envelops everything in its path... and every few years, on that same night, somebody dies.

Cypress and his friends live in a quiet town... with one very notable ghost legend! Phantoms are one thing, but rumors of possessed killings are another, and things are getting very strange around here! Can they survive until dawn breaks the fog the next morning?

Currently this project is a playable wip that contains one fully-completed route! (Out of a planned three, with one True Ending, currently in-progress.) This page will be updated when the others are available for download!

Please feel free to comment with your thoughts and opinions - thank you <3

(This game is completely free because of the licenses under which the soundtrack is distributed, but you can always show your support via ko-fi or patreon! You can also track its progress on highfog.tumblr.com or by following me on my tumblr or twitter.)
